amendment.description: Amendment sought to authorize the Secretary of the Air Force to procure not more than 10 AESA radar upgrades for the Air National Guard F-15C/D aircraft offset by cuts to levels authorized beyond the President's Budget Request, spread across 9 accounts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No.1 printed in House Report 113-455 to authorize the Secretary of the Air Force to procure not more than 10 AESA radar upgrades for the Air National Guard F-15C/D aircraft, which is offset by cuts to levels authorized beyond the President's Budget Request, spread across 9 accounts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 229 (Roll no. 225).
